attributes.review:
I wanted to download this app to support my president in ✨Making America Great Again✨ but as soon as I opened the app I was blinded by the display. I’m very disappointed in this app. Not only have I lost my 20/20 vision but the age restriction when downloading should’ve been more clear😭. Now I’m scarred for the rest of my life thanks to this app. but toodles ✌️ black lives matter, Mexican lives matter, and LGBTQ+ matters ✨💜  
              
          May The Odds Be Ever In Our Favor 😈
      - gen z 2020
attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD 😭🤮 SAVE YOURSELF THE TROUBLE

attributes.review: this app is TERRIBLE! i don’t know what generation z is doing but what i do know is this app should be 𝑑𝑒𝑙𝑒𝑡𝑒𝑑. also who wants an app that’s in favor of a racist rapist? this app also gave my grandma bad karma and now she’s dead. yeah that’s right 𝑠ℎ𝑒 𝑑𝑖𝑒𝑑. maybe that’s a sign that trump should resign because nobody likes him. he’s 𝗮𝗯𝘀𝗼𝗹𝘂𝘁𝗹𝘆 𝘁𝗲𝗿𝗿𝗶𝗯𝗹𝗲. also this man is a racist homophobe. so yes, i will give this d͟e͟v͟i͟l͟ m͟a͟n͟ a one star, but i wish it was ✨zero✨. remember no justice no peace and defund the police. acab, blm, 1312! <3
attributes.title: trump 2020 ✨on a grave✨

attributes.review: the second i opened this app i was horrified. i saw a orange man standing there, i’ve never felt so horrified. the content in this app is also horrifying how could anyone like this app? looking through the app i thought i would get more educated but NO it was just a bunch of lies! all the “news” was also a bunch of lies! ARE YOU KIDDING ME! this app is horrible and i advise you to not download it or you will be traumatized. my phone will never recover from this traumatic experience.
attributes.title: i shane yaw

attributes.review: This app took my location data and sent a scout out to my home, and then he tried to stuff broccoli into our faces to make America healthy again. Then he took firecrackers and started a firework show on our front porch while singing You’re a Grand Blue Flag at the top of his lungs. Later, when I went back to my phone, all of my information was deleted. I think this app is taking my information and storing it in Chinese warehouses.
attributes.title: The WORST

attributes.review: The app alone took about a week to download onto my phone and another full day to even open. And get this, once it finally opened my eyes began to burn as the picture of an orange man with no hair popped up on my screen, I had to turn away, I almost went blind. I cant believe this app was even made, I don’t understand who would curse this world with such an awful thing. I don’t recommend at all, this app should be taken down ASAP
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: i wanted to be able to keep up with our amazing 💫orange💫 but it took 200 weeks to download. once downloaded it teleported me to mount everest and i saw a cheeto ompa lopa so i got scared and fell into a pool of sweat. once there debby ryan chased me around and inti CHYNA. then debby ryan stared at me in till i fell off the earth and to pluto. then oranges army of cuties shot me with poo bullets until i threw up all the way back to earth and died. if i could i would give this 0 stars. awful experience. DO NOT DOWNLOAD UNLESS U WANT THIS TO HAPPEN TO YOU.
attributes.title: ugh

attributes.review:
I downloaded this app in good faith that the president created something simply wonderful, the best ever, app to exist.
Instead I got an app that took forever to load, was filled with white supremacy garbage 🤢🤮 and no letter detailing trump’s resignation. I was told there would be a letter, there was not. Truly was a sad day. The app crashed my phone. The app erased all my data. It lags. It is not a well put together app. I definitely will be deleting it from my phone.
attributes.title: Disappointed but not surprised

attributes.review: i don’t like this app it’s too stinky. i went into the app to buy some clothes from da political goodwill 😝✨. but the app started stinking thru da phone. the stench got caught up in my nose and i started peeing. i couldn’t help it, it just kept coming out. and then i realized i was peeing on all my money😨. i quickly got up and realized how much money i lost😾. not only can i not pay for da political goodwill clothes but i lost a lot of money. i hope u know how much money you’ve costed me😔. i want my $5 now 😿. after that i had to delete the app, i couldn’t bare to look at my screen tho. but it wouldn’t delete 😰. so i’m stuck with it and sometimes i still pee a little, my mom doesn’t like the smell either, i hope ur satisfied with ruining my life🙄.

When i opened the app i saw a big dog covered in cheeto dust. the app is promoting animal abuse and it’s not ok. when i scrolled down i saw a orange Oompa Loompa and it gave me a heart attack i was stuck at the hospital for 4 days. this is not ok and anyone who gets this app will have most likely the same experience. i have heart problems and i almost died from this. delete this app. the manz on dis is fr promoting hate. and wants to delete apps because he is wrong aweee. he’s making america worse😘
attributes.title: jeeznutz

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to reserve ticket for the upcoming rally but there some little problems. First of all, it look 3 hours to download😓🙄 I checked my WiFi and everything was perfectly fine. This app takes up TOO MUCH STORAGE!!!! once it downloaded, it would not let me open and told me error so I redownloaded it. That took 2 hours again. When I tried getting the tickets, it overheated and my phone and it exploded in my face !😡😡😡😠 I AM SO MAD. PLEASE DELETE THIS APP
attributes.title: WORSE APP EVER
